faqs.question: What is CoachLume?
faqs.answer: CoachLume is an AI-powered learning platform where users can practice interviews, improve communication, and learn new skills through interactive voice-based agents.

faqs.question: How do I use CoachLume?
faqs.answer: After logging in, go to the dashboard, select a role such as interviewer or lecturer, and start an interactive voice session with the AI agent.

faqs.question: What roles are available?
faqs.answer: CoachLume offers multiple roles including Interviewer, Lecturer, Language Coach, and Meditation Guide.

faqs.question: How does resume-based interview work?
faqs.answer: You upload your resume, and the AI conducts a mock interview based on your skills, experience, and job role you're targeting.

faqs.question: Does CoachLume support dark mode?
faqs.answer: Yes, CoachLume supports both light and dark modes depending on user preference.

faqs.question: How does the credit system work?
faqs.answer: Every interaction with the AI voice agent uses credits. Users receive free credits initially, and additional credits can be purchased.

faqs.question: Can I listen to the AI responses again?
faqs.answer: Yes, CoachLume allows you to pause, replay, and listen to any part of the interaction again.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, CoachLume uses secure authentication via Stack Auth and stores user data safely.

faqs.question: Does CoachLume provide feedback?
faqs.answer: CoachLume gives instant feedback based on your responses and helps you improve communication and interview skills.

faqs.question: Where can I manage my account?
faqs.answer: You can manage your account from the dashboard, access past interactions, and update your profile settings.
